Top 3 client types for cloud
We recently quizzed a number of 'cloud confident' accounting professionals on which small business clients they have been upgrading to QuickBooks Online. The results were really consistent and boiled down to three types:
That includes clients on BankLink, all types of desktop software, Excel, Word, paper-based records.
Why? Working online is more efficient and the $4.99 offer makes it very cost-effective
Typically start-up businesses using Excel, Word or paper-based records.
Why? The client needs a solution and the $4.99 offer makes it cost-effective
These are clients on QuickBooks 2009 or later, Reckon Accounts 2014 or earlier, including Reckon Hosted.
Why? Free conversion, client likes QuickBooks and the $4.99 offer makes it cost-effective
Further to these 'types', there are typical attributes or behaviours small businesses ideal for cloud accounting display. You can see them here >>
So if you’re looking for ways to save time and build your practice using cloud accounting this year, identifying and talking to your small businesses clients that fit the above criteria is a great start.
And if you need any help with your move to the cloud, please call the team on 1800 618 521 who’ll be happy to assist.
Thanks!
QuickBooks Online ProAdvisor team
